message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $13,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $13,000 is a fair price considering its value, I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $11,500 is closer to what I had in mind, but I'm aiming for something closer to $10,500. Would that work for you?
